Summary: 2 lights changing from red to yellow no blinking below the edge of a storm heading east to west silently
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Mt Pleasant
There were no other sightings in Mt Pleasant on or around March 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to watch a thunderstorm that just went over Clare MI to the north of me. I seen something in the sky to my left so i started to watch it. It was phasing from red to yellow and had no sound what so ever. I realized it wasn't a plane or a helicopter so i ran inside and grabbed my camera. My girlfriends son was on the computer so i told him to come check it out. He came i started filming then he said there is another one. i told him to get his mom. she came out and seen it too. They were moving from east to west just below the edge of the storm clouds casting a little light on the clouds. They seemed kind of egg shaped not round. sorry i didn't upload the video but not sure how to yet. I was just blown away by what i seen because i usually can put some kind of explanation to things but this i am drawing a blank.
